item.title: Review of Phuket Dragon Muay Thai
item.author: aanayini@gmail.com (Arjun Nayini)
item.description: It is a hot, humid morning on Phuket’s Soi Tai-ed, what has been called a mecca for “fitness holidays”. All year round, foreigners come here from all over the world to spend anywhere from weeks to months getting in shape. This single street has dozens of gyms and studios with people learning everything from weightlifting to yoga to MMA. Still, the street is most famous as a destination to learn Thailand’s national sport: Muay Thai.
